name: Shadow Asylum
description:
Controls [Keyboard and Mouse]:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Toggle Torch

Controls [Gamepad]:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Look

[X on PS4], or [A on Xbox] - Jump

Right Trigger - Shoot

Right Stick [Pressed] - Toggle Torch

You play as an investigator entering the dreary remains of an old mental institution found in a remote location to the north of a bustling city. You received calls of strange disappearances within the building and, armed with a revolver and torch, you enter this foreboding location to find out what is truly going on.

Inside, you find that you are now trapped by vicious, hollow creatures with the movements and mannerisms of puppets. these creatures come from below the ground like shadows, and chase you mercilessly. You must survive for as long as you can while these husks come for you. 

You are tasked with killing as many of the shadow creatures as possible before eventually being overwhelmed by them. See how far you can get and post your final scores in the comments section of this game!

This project was created in collaboration with Twitter user @FaffyBanana, and was completed in a week for the Weekly Game Jam.

#WeeklyGameJam #WGJam

Game Jam Theme: "Shadow Puppets"
